alert.note: Alert for Adams; Franklin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 7:04PM EDT until June 26 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Adams County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Franklin County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 704 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Carroll Valley, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chambersburg, Waynesboro, Gettysburg, Shippensburg, Guilford, Carroll Valley, Fayetteville, Wayne Heights, Mont Alto, Scotland, Lake Heritage and Rouzerville. This includes Interstate 81 from mile markers 17 to 25. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
